title: One Month of Piano: What I've Learned
excerpt: Looking back at my first month learning piano, I'm surprised by how much muscle memory matters...
body:
Looking back at my first month learning piano, I'm surprised by how much muscle memory matters.

## What Worked

- **Daily practice over long sessions** - 30 minutes every day beats 2 hours twice a week
- **Starting with worship songs I love** - Motivation stays high
- **Using a metronome** - Humbling at first, but my timing improved

## Next Month's Focus

I want to nail the I-IV-V-vi progression in at least 3 keys without looking at my hands.

title: Why Atomic Habits Changed My Approach
excerpt: I used to set big goals and burn out. This book shifted my focus to systems instead...
body:
I used to set big goals and burn out. This book shifted my focus to systems instead.

## The Key Insight

It's not about the goal, it's about the system. Anyone can set a goal to read 30 books. But building a system where you read for 20 minutes before bed every night? That's what actually gets you there.

title: Finding Joy in Morning Workouts
excerpt: I never thought I'd be a morning person. But there's something about finishing a workout before 7 AM...
body:
I never thought I'd be a morning person. But there's something about finishing a workout before 7 AM that sets the tone for everything else.

## The Shift

For years I tried to work out in the evenings. And for years, 'something came up' almost every day.
